price: Wọ́n wí pé: “Àjọkẹ́-ayé sọ ẹnì kan di ọmọ (nínú àwọn mọlāikah Rẹ̀).” Mímọ́ ni fún Un - Kò rí bẹ́ẹ̀; ẹrúsìn alápọ̀n-ọ́nlé ni wọ́n.
arabic: وَقَالُواْ ٱتَّخَذَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ وَلَدٗاۗ سُبۡحَٰنَهُۥۚ بَلۡ عِبَادٞ مُّكۡرَمُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: waqālū ittakhadha al-raḥmānu waladan sub'ḥānahu bal ʿibādun muk'ramūna
